Grew up on the Legendary CS1.5... then CS1.6 came... then the CSSource came which was a huge miss, but CSGO was definately a step in the right direction. It isn't as snappy and sharp as the 1.6 was (probably not achievable any more), but it is up there at the top when it comes to play-ability and the overall gameplay experience. 

Apart for the inevitable cheater problem (despite VAC doing it best) it is a fun, well balanced multiplayer game which I love to play and I encourage you to play too.

  d. you want to waste $50 on skins
